title: The Surge + CREO Special Employee Kit [Update 6]
description:
Year: 2017
Genre: Action, RPG, Cyberpunk, 3st Person, 3D
Publisher: Focus Home Interactive
Language: RUS | ENG
Language of voice: ENG

The new project of the Deck13 studio will surprise fans of the genre with the "innovative combat system".
The Surge will develop in the anti-utopian world of an uncertain future. His appearance, influenced by science fiction literary works. Manage a cyber warrior, dressed in an exoskeleton and armed with a sawtooth.
A new system for improving weapons and equipment, while modifications will be produced mainly in battles.
In your workshop, these details can be used to improve your weapons for battle and armor sets, such as: armor, helmet, metal boots.
During battles with enemies, a well-known bullet time system will be used.

FOR FULL LIST OF CHANGES SEE PATCHNOTES.TXT INSIDE THE ISO
THE GAME IS PATCHED TO VERSION 33841 (SVN)

How to install : 

Mount or burn
Install
Play
